marklogic.body:
i am not using cannabis these days, i dont really need it right now. during my chemo last year i smoked 3 times a day and was amazed at the powerful Nausea relief. my background is in law enforcement and i am a grandmother too, and i was pretty far beyond my zone when it came to finding someplace to get my DOCTOR RECOMMENDED cannabis. walked into two places, including N cross and both times the verification process was pretty intensive. took me 2 days to get into the first place because i arrived on a saturday, and they could not Reach my oncologist. even though i had my papers and ID, they were completely thorough. the employees were not of my generation and had tattoos and whatnot, but i saw nothing except for professional service, and focus on which strains and products would help the most. no smoking weed, getting high talk. no speakeasy attitude.
there were 3 dozen delivery services in town when i got my recommendation, i assume they were undisturbed by the city. I never felt comfortable using them. dont like the idea of someone coming to my home. and my son is a cop, and his car would probably freak the driver out pretty good.
